arc615d.name: DEVAM ARC 615 D
arc615d.description: Perfectly suitable for **heavy metal fabrication** (continuous use of 3.15 mm, 4 mm, 5 mm welding electrodes, including hardfacing electrodes). PWM technology-based machine with **heavy double module system for easy maintenance**. Summing amplifier control with **active feedback system** for easy arc initiation and welding arc stability. Long performance life and **high power factor** for reduced electricity cost.

arc415d.name: DEVAM ARC 415 D
arc415d.description: Perfectly suitable for **heavy metal fabrication** (continuous use of 3.15 mm, 4 mm welding electrodes, including hardfacing electrodes). PWM technology-based machine with **heavy module system for easy maintenance**. Summing amplifier control with **active feedback system** for easy arc initiation and welding arc stability. Long performance life and **high power factor** for reduced electricity cost.

arc400.name: DEVAM ARC 400
arc400.description: Perfectly suitable for **metal fabrication** (continuous use of 3.15 mm, 4 mm welding electrodes, including hardfacing electrodes). PWM technology-based machine with **dual module system for easy maintenance**. Summing amplifier control with **active feedback system** for easy arc initiation and welding arc stability. Long performance life and **high power factor** for reduced electricity cost.

arc230a300.name: DEVAM ARC 230A/300
arc230a300.description: Advanced **microcontroller based machine** for enhanced performance. Operation in both **single & two phase with auto detection circuit**. Suitable for **continuous use of 3.15 mm electrode & intermittent 4 mm electrode**. Special functions: **Anti – Stick, VRD, Lift TIG, Digital Display with Active Feedback System**.
specs: Rated Input Voltage: AC 220V & AC 415V (1/2 PHASE machine)

arc250industrial.name: DEVAM ARC 250 INDUSTRIAL
arc250industrial.description: Inverter **PWM technology based** welding machine suitable for use of **2.54 mm & 3.15 mm welding electrodes**. PWM technology-based welding machines for easy maintenance. **Reliable Active Feedback Control System** for stable welding arc. Long performance life with ergonomic look and **high power factor** for reduced electricity cost.
specs: Open Circuit Voltage: Around 60 V DC

arc200.name: DEVAM ARC 200
arc200.description: Inverter **PWM technology based most basic model** suitable for **light fabrication & running use**. Can be used with **2.54 mm & 3.15 mm welding electrodes**. **Reliable Active Feedback Control System** for stable welding arc. **High power factor** for reduced electricity cost.

mig615d.name: DEVAM MIG 615 D
mig615d.description: **MIG/ARC Dual Mode** & suitable for **heavy metal fabrication** (continuous use of 1.2 mm / 1.6 mm wire & 3.15 mm, 4 mm, 5 mm welding electrode). Latest **PWM technology** with maintenance friendly design. **Active Feedback Control System** for outstanding durable performance. **Thermal Overload Protection** and **Voltage Control** for fine tuning arc characteristics.

mig450500.name: DEVAM MIG 450/500
mig450500.description: **MIG/ARC Dual Mode** & suitable for **heavy metal fabrication** (continuous use of 0.8 mm / 1.0 mm / 1.2 mm wire & 3.15 mm & 4 mm welding electrode). Latest **PWM technology** with maintenance friendly design. **Active Feedback Control System** for outstanding durable performance. **Thermal Overload Protection** and **Voltage Control** for fine tuning arc characteristics.

mig415d.name: DEVAM MIG 415 D
mig415d.description: **MIG/ARC Dual Mode** & suitable for **heavy metal fabrication** (continuous use of 1.2 mm wire & 4 mm welding electrode). Latest **PWM technology** with maintenance friendly design. **Active Feedback Control System** for outstanding durable performance. **Thermal Overload Protection** and **Voltage Control** for fine tuning arc characteristics.

mig400.name: DEVAM MIG 400
mig400.description: **Wire Speed Control** for maintaining arc stability and weld quality. Wire size used: **0.8 / 1.0 / 1.2 MM**. **Voltage Control** for fine tuning arc characteristics. **Thermal Overload Protection** and **Active Feedback Control System**.
specs: Rated Output Voltage Range: 16V – 34 V DC

mig250industrial.name: DEVAM MIG 250 INDUSTRIAL
mig250industrial.description: Inverter **PWM technology based** welding machine suitable for **0.8 mm / 1.0 mm solidwire & fluxwire**. Can be used in **ARC mode with 2.54 mm / 3.15 mm welding electrodes**. **Precise Wire Feed Speed Control** and **Voltage Control**. **Thermal Overload Protection**.
specs: Open Circuit Voltage: Around 50 V DC

mig200.name: DEVAM MIG 200
mig200.description: Inverter **PWM technology based most basic MIG welding model** suitable for **light fabrication & running use**. Can be used with **0.8 MM solidwire & fluxwire**. Supports **MIG / ARC function**. **Reliable Active Feedback Control System** and **fine speed control**. **High power factor**.

tig615d.name: DEVAM TIG 615 D
tig615d.description: **High Frequency (HF) Start** based **PWM technology TIG / ARC Dual Machine** for non-contact arc initiation. **Active Feedback Control System** and **Reliable Design & Easy Maintenance**. **Thermal Management** system. Suitable for **2.4 mm & 3 mm Tungsten in TIG mode** & **2.54 mm & 3.15 mm electrode in ARC mode**. Long performance life and **high power factor**.

tig415d.name: DEVAM TIG 415 D
tig415d.description: **High Frequency (HF) Start** based **PWM technology TIG / ARC Dual Machine** for non-contact arc initiation. **Active Feedback Control System** and **Reliable Design & Easy Maintenance**. **Thermal Management** system. Suitable for **2.4 mm & 3 mm Tungsten in TIG mode** & **2.54 mm & 3.15 mm electrode in ARC mode**. Long performance life and **high power factor**.

tig315d.name: DEVAM TIG 315D
tig315d.description: **High Frequency (HF) Start** based **PWM technology TIG / ARC Dual Machine** for non-contact arc initiation, prevents tungsten contamination, and improves arc control. **Active Feedback Control System** and **Reliable Design & Easy Maintenance**. **Thermal Management** system. **60% Duty Cycle** machine. Suitable for **2.4 mm & 3 mm Tungsten in TIG mode** & **2.54 mm & 3.15 mm electrode in ARC mode**.

tig200heavyduty.name: DEVAM TIG 200 HEAVY DUTY
tig200heavyduty.description: **High Frequency (HF) Start** based **PWM technology TIG / ARC Dual Machine** for non-contact arc initiation, prevents tungsten contamination, and improves arc control. **Active Feedback Control System** and **Reliable Design & Easy Maintenance**. **Thermal Management** system. **100% Duty Cycle** machine.
specs: Rated Input Voltage: 220 V +- 15% AC (SINGLE PHASE)

tig200.name: DEVAM TIG 200
tig200.description: Industrial grade TIG welding machine specially designed for **stainless steel sheet metal fabrication**. **High Frequency (HF) Start** based **PWM technology TIG / ARC Dual Machine** for non-contact arc initiation, prevents tungsten contamination, and improves arc control. **Active Feedback Control System** and **Reliable Design & Easy Maintenance**. **Thermal Management** system. **60% Duty Cycle** machine.
specs: Rated Input Voltage: 220 V +- 15% AC (SINGLE PHASE)
Open Circuit Voltage: Around 60 V DC
